message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth a lot to me. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $150?
